title: APUOR Men's Jeans Regular Fit Stretch Carpenter Jeans for Men 5-Pocket Straight Leg Denim Pants
description: REGULAR FIT: Men's sweatpant jeans are not tight and suitable for various body types. When you work or wear them daily, you will move freely

MATERIAL & FABRIC: APUOR men's bootcut jeans material consists of 69% cotton, 29% polyester, and 2% spandex. Cotton material ensures comfort, polyester is more breathable and moisture wicking, and spandex gives this denim pants elasticity
SIZE & FIT: If you are in between sizes, order ONE SIZE UP
ANY OCCASION: APUOR men's classic dark blue,light blue ,black jeans are suitable for various occasions, daily wear, work, going out, and more
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Wash and dry inside out with like colors. Cold or warm water is recommended
